thread.section_title: Hotel Duo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of Hotel Duo, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Raheleh K
title: Great Location
text:
The location is unbeatable. Tons of restaurants and bars directly outside of the hotel. It s a quaint cute hotel that is very affordable for the Marais neighborhood. The bar was rarely open which was a little annoying but was still overall great.
The rooms are tiny, but you really should only be in your room to sleep.
